user_query: I'm planning a family trip to Barcelona and I need some information to make the most of our visit. Can you suggest family-friendly hotels in Barcelona? Also, provide me with the estimated taxi fares for traveling within the city. Additionally, I would like to know the specifications of Gulfstream aircraft, including details such as engine type, maximum speed, and range.

TaskList.description: Search for family-friendly hotels in Barcelona.
Calculate estimated taxi fares for traveling within Barcelona.
Retrieve specifications of Gulfstream aircraft including engine type, maximum speed, and range.
